name: RedBloodCellCountErythrocytes
title: Red Blood Cell Count (Erythrocytes)
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Red Blood Cell (Erythrocyte) Count results in blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Red Blood Cell Count levels in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Red Blood Cell Count terms in blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Red Blood Cell Count terms in blood.)
